pullRequest.title: XRDDEV-867 fix transaction handling
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://jira.niis.org/browse/XRDDEV-867
Exceptions now rollback transaction and open-session-in-view is no longer in use.
In-progress feature branches may be incompatible and start producing lazy loading exceptions after this has been merged.
#341 was merged without these changes, and this branch has changes from 341 and the needed fixes.

commit.message: XRDDEV-867 make open session in view = false, add test for it, fix CertificateProfileInstantiationException
XRDDEV-867 make transactions roll back for checked exceptions, add tests for that
XRDDEV-867 fix csr methods that did not require member_id for SIGN csrs
XRDDEV-867 naive fix lazy loading problem for getClientGroups and getClientTlsCertificates
XRDDEV-867 naive fix lazy loading problem for getClientServiceDescriptions, getGroup, deleteGroupMember
XRDDEV-867 naive fix lazy loading problem for getServiceDescription
XRDDEV-867 add tests that fail if some endpoints would fail due to non-loaded lazy objects
XRDDEV-867 update lazy loaded strategy for client properties to proper one
XRDDEV-867 fix endpoint related lazy loading exceptions

nodes.bodyText: Would be good to use @Override annotation here
